articles.description: In the semi-finals, Sanjida and Salma helped Bangladesh defend 113 against Thailand, while Zimbabwe fell short of their target after Stokell and Maguire starred for Ireland
articles.content: NewsIn the semi-finals, Sanjida and Salma helped Bangladesh defend 113 against Thailand, while Zimbabwe fell short of their target after Stokell and Maguire starred for Ireland

articles.author: Sidharth Monga
articles.title: Axar Patel reminisces and executes in throwback to crunched tennis-ball action - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He and Bumrah started off as tennis-ball bowlers in matches of six to eight overs in Gujarat. Friday night was not too different for them
articles.content: From outsider to contender, Axar Patel is on the move
